channel.title: Posts on Ashley's Project Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ashley's Project Blog

item.title: Building a Replay System for Town of Salem
item.author: user@example.com (Hugo Author)
item.description: Town of Salem is an online multiplayer social deduction video game based on the Mafia party game. The game is characterized by rapid rounds of quick judgements and information asymmetries. Confusion is a resource, strategy is a sword, and expectation is a weakness. Being able to review previous games and study how each choice you made determined your opportunities and outcomes would be of great advantage in refining game skill.

item.title: Dear ImGui with .NET in Unity
item.author: user@example.com (Hugo Author)
item.description: Here’s how I was able to get ImGui working inside the Unity game engine from a .NET mod loaded with BepInEx . ImGuiRenderingPlugin performs the heavy lifting of hooking the relevant graphics interface and acts as an ImGui backend. ImGui.NET is used as a wrapper around the native front-end provided by cimgui . Dependency Setup With BepInEx already installed, I built the example project and set up a post-build task to copy it to <Game>/BepInEx/plugins/ImGuiMod/Mod.
